main event: On May 10, 1957, multiple witnesses reported seeing an unidentified flying object and small humanoid figures in Beaucourt-sur-Ancre, France.
interesting points: Several witnesses, including a Hungarian refugee, reported being approached by a blinding light,Three small figures, dressed in grayish-beige outfits, were observed at a distance of less than 50 meters,The object emitted a powerful light that changed color and caused agitation in nearby vegetation,The scene was investigated by local authorities who found suspicious tracks left behind,The witnesses were deemed trustworthy and consistent in their accounts.
sighted object: An unidentified flying object and three small humanoid figures
witness description: Included various local residents and a Hungarian refugee.
